keyPolicies.policyDescription: You deserve better than chaos. I will respect the vote so we can finally get on with the priorities we all share.
The Conservatives will put an extra £33.9 billion a year into our NHS, with £16 million already promised to upgrade Tameside Hospital.
Greater Manchester Police will see 347 extra police officers on our streets this year alone, keeping our streets safe.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More funding for every pupil in every school
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Giving our children the best start in life is fundamental. We are increasing the funding per pupil in every school.
Thousands will benefit locally from an increase in the Living Wage to £10.50 an hour - giving the lowest paid a pay rise.
We will hire 6,000 extra GPs and create 50 million extra appointments.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting Brexit Done: You deserve better than chaos.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school: Giving our children the best start in life.
issues.health: Investing in our NHS: The Conservatives will put an extra £33.9 billion a year into our NHS, with £16 million already promised to upgrade Tameside Hospital.
issues.labourEmployment: Supporting working families: Thousands will benefit locally from an increase in the Living Wage to £10.50 an hour - giving the lowest paid a pay rise.
issues.lawCrime: Hiring 20,000 new police officers: Greater Manchester Police will see 347 extra police officers on our streets this year alone, keeping our streets safe.
issues.socialWelfare: Supporting working families: Thousands will benefit locally from an increase in the Living Wage to £10.50 an hour - giving the lowest paid a pay rise.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Dawn Cobb, on behalf of Dan Costello, both at 58 Broadhurst, Denton, M34 3TN. Printed by Paragon CC, Suite 1, 3rd Floor, Universal Square, Manchester, M12 6JH
